thread.title: J.P. Morgan to Some Employees: Pay for Your Own Phone
thread.title_full: J.P. Morgan to Some Employees: Pay for Your Own Phone - WSJ

author: Emily Glazer
title: J.P. Morgan to Some Employees: Pay for Your Own Phone
text:
In its latest round of cost cuts, J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. is picking BlackBerrys.
The nationâ€™s largest bank by assets is hoping to save tens of millions of dollars by eliminating support for the BlackBerry wireless devices next year and mandating that some employees pay for their own devices, BlackBerry or otherwise, according to people close to the bank.
The move is part of a broader effort at big U.S. banks to keep costs...
